review: Awesome!  Excellent Amazon!! Worth every penny.  You guys did it again :)
author: JZW

review: I have a TV with built-in Internet TV, a Chromecast, PS3, and Fire TV stick.  Hands down, the Fire TV stick is my entire family's favorite.  It is simple to use.  The video quality has be great.  I have only used it for Netflix and Amazon Prime, but someday I will play with the video gaming function.
author: Netmask

review: Excellent product,extremely user friendly for a non tech person like me. Fast streaming no problems with freezing or loss of signal like Netflix.
author: eric eugene patrick

review: Works great so far. No buffering, easy to use
author: David Cook

review: Works great! Its fast is easy to navigate. A lot faster then the roku 1. It supports profiles for netflix where the roku 1 does not. No complaints at all
author: Clay

review: I bought this because the apps UI on my 2010 Smart TV Samsung sucks. Great product. Everything I need it to be and very easy to use
author: David H. Manatan
